nodes.text: Yekermo outer robes were a type of robe. The Palandag musicians Hhex, Jhat and Dhuz wore brown, traditional yekermo outer robes while performing at the Canto Casino in the city of Canto Bight on the planet Cantonica in around 34 ABY.

Yekermo outer robes first appeared in the 2017 film Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi and were first identified in the accompanying reference book Star Wars: The Last Jedi: The Visual Dictionary, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo.
